meanings.definition: A written or filmed record of a traveler's experiences.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed reading the travelog of my friend's trip to Europe.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a detailed travelog of all her adventures around the world.
meanings.sent3: The travelog of my disastrous camping trip could be a bestseller!
meanings.sent4: Her travelog was like a treasure map of memories waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The travelog painted a vivid picture of the sights and sounds of the bustling city.

meanings.sent1: I want to travelog my journey through the mountains.
meanings.sent2: She loves to travelog her trips to exotic destinations.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally travelogged my grocery shopping trip instead of my vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her words travelogged the emotions and experiences of her travels.
meanings.sent5: He travelogs with such detail that you feel like you're right there with him.

meanings.definition: A travelog is a type of documentary film.
meanings.sent1: We watched a fascinating travelog about the Amazon rainforest.
meanings.sent2: The film festival featured a variety of travelogs from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The travelog about penguins in Antarctica was both informative and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her latest project is a travelog that explores the culture of Japan.
meanings.sent5: The travelog captured the essence of the desert landscape with stunning visuals.
